definition: stone roller/roller and millstone/to grind/to crush/to husk
to rub/to grind/to polish/to sharpen/to wear down/to die out/to waste time/to pester/to insist

sentences.english: In the flour mill, wheat grains are powdered.
sentences.chinese: 他用碾磨机把谷物磨成面粉。

sentences.english: Milling fractures many of the cells of the endosperm, exposing their contents.
sentences.chinese: 碾磨使大量胚乳细胞破裂，暴露了它的内含物。

sentences.english: Railway stretches from the mills to the jetty terminal.
sentences.chinese: 铁路从碾磨厂一直延伸到突堤的终端。

sentences.english: A mill grinds grain into flour.
sentences.chinese: 碾磨机把谷物磨成细粉。

sentences.english: But it goes through a milling process that removes many nutrients.
sentences.chinese: 但白米在碾磨加工过程中会流失很多营养成分。

sentences.english: He used a miller to mill the grain into flour.
sentences.chinese: 他用碾磨机把谷物磨成面粉。

sentences.english: Vitamin B is also lost in the milling process.
sentences.chinese: 在碾磨过程中维生素B是流失了。
他碾磨你们，直至你们清白。

definition: milling/to grind/to polish by grinding/to abrade/whetstone/pestle
stone roller/roller and millstone/to grind/to crush/to husk
to rub/to grind/to polish/to sharpen/to wear down/to die out/to waste time/to pester/to insist
